column5: I found this interesting. I knew earthworms came from elsewhere, but I haven't thought of earthworms as an invasive species. Makes you wonder,  with millions of them being transported up north every year. Andy    http://www.thestar.com/News/article/208509
What will they think of next? Is there anything in this world that is good for us and the environment?
P3TA must be really upset, I can't think of a better reason to put a worm on the hook and head out for the day
Nope Cliff nothing, everything we seem to enjoy is harmful to are health.  That's all right I just hope I die a happy man! Not to soon though  Whopper
Well i guess that means we should all do our part and go drown some worms at the fishin' hole
